FuncDef: The reset qos user-id command clears the traffic statistics about the eight FQs and CAR policy of a specified user.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a user.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967294.

Reset traffic statistics about the eight FQs and CAR policy of the specified user in the inbound direction.
-

Reset traffic statistics about the eight FQs and CAR policy of the specified user in the outbound direction.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The reset qos user-id command clears the traffic statistics about the eight FQs and CAR policy of a specified user.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
